thread.title: Trip of the week: MANtucket Package
thread.title_full: Trip of the week: MANtucket Package | The Columbus Dispatch

title: Trip of the week: MANtucket Package
text:
Each week, Travel Editor Cindy Decker highlights an interesting travel package sent to her inbox.
MANtucket Package
HARBORVIEW NANTUCKET, 508-228-4423, www.harborviewnantucket.com
THE TRIP: This getaway designed for guys — or craft-beer lovers — includes at least two nights in one of 11 unusual Nantucket harbor-side cottages with one to four bedrooms. All cottages have full kitchens, laundry facilities, and exterior balconies and decks with harbor views.
The package, which features 25 percent off room prices, also includes a $75 dinner credit and VIP passes to Cisco Brewers, where guests will receive free entry, a free tour, 50 percent off merchandise and a $50 drink credit for two.
The Massachusetts island package is available through Dec. 3.
THE COST: from $1,583 for two nights
cdecker@dispatch.com
@DispatchTravel
